channel.title: [PI] major animation glitch
channel.description: everytime i add my skillcape emotes into my Project insanity (sagi-x evolution) client, every animation in game gets pretty messed up..:s how culd i make it to where they dont do this? i already went in and renamed all the .dat files to something else..:s still didnt work..can anyone help me find a fix to this? i wuld rly appreciate it.
